top_comments.comment: I've bought their album today 'cuz they never have a bad song. Their performances are incredible <3 They are AMAZING!!
this song is fire 🔥🔥🔥 by the way I love you jeonghan! 😍❤️❤️❤️
Killer song & choreography. Kudos to the wardrobe and set design. These superstars are looking FINE AF in their suits. Daaaammnnnn…..
1:29 Our crime lord Jun making an assassinated instructions.

comments_since_last_sample.body: I’m literally in love with this editon it deserves so much and their styles need a crown for that. KINGS of vocals and synchronization, this is a big pop!! I am amazed SEVENTEEN ❤️
I can literally hear hoshi screaming in the last chorus 😭

SVT demostrando que son unos grandes... de verdad, ver sus presentaciones es siempre un deleite para mí, y no es necesario ser un fan del grupo para disfrutar de la calidad que muestran en cada performance.
